intro.title: About me
intro.description: Front-end developer with 1 year of experience in building innovative web applications using the latest technologies such as React.js and Next.js. Passionate about building high-quality, responsive, and user-friendly applications that deliver a seamless experience to users. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. I also enjoy sharing my knowledge and participating in developer communities. I am currently preparing for university studies.
